commandsExecutor

Interface ICommandsExecutor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DifferentialDriveCommandsExecutor

    public interface ICommandsExecutor
    Commands executor, translates the command type into real action executed by the real robot.
    Author:
    Alessio Tonioni

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeCommand(java.lang.String cmd, java.lang.String speed)
      Execute a single simple command, at the return from this method the robot is executing the given command and continues till another command is put in execution.
      void executeController(java.lang.String cntType, java.lang.String speed, java.lang.String isForward)
      Creates an ILineFollowerController and starts it.
      it.unibo.iot.robot.IRobot getRobot()
      Returns the IRobot that it is controlled.
      void setRobot(it.unibo.iot.robot.IRobot robot)
      Sets the IRobot to control

    • Method Detail

      • executeController

        void executeController(java.lang.String cntType,
                     java.lang.String speed,
                     java.lang.String isForward)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates an ILineFollowerController and starts it. At the return from this method the robot should automaticaly follow the line on the ground.
        Parameters:
        cntType - type of the controller
        speed - default speed
        isForward - true if the robot moves forward
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • executeCommand

        void executeCommand(java.lang.String cmd,
                  java.lang.String speed)
                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Execute a single simple command, at the return from this method the robot is executing the given command and continues till another command is put in execution.
        Parameters:
        cmd - command to execute
        speed - speed for the command
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
